data.caption: Disclosure Under Regulation 23(9) Of SEBI (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 For The Half Year Ended 31St March, 2022
data.news_body: Pursuant to the Regulation 23(9) of the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, please find enclosed herewith the disclosure of Related Party Transactions (RPT) on a consolidated basis, in the format specified in the relevant accounting standards for the half year ended 31st March, 2022.Please note that the Company has filed RPT disclosure in XBRL mode on 23rd May, 2022 as per the BSE notice no : 20210906-31 and NSE circular no: NSE/CML/2021/34 dated 6th September, 2021. We wish to inform you that the XBRL in new SEBI format is yet to be released by the Exchanges and also there is no clarity in the mode of filing of RPT disclosure. We are filing the RPT disclosure as per new SEBI format in PDF mode.Kindly take the same into your records.
